pages.text: $(li)The Mimic Octopus is a neutral curious animal that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/warm_ocean)Warm Oceans$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:structures/coral_reefs)Coral Reefs$(/l).$(br)$(li)They have the hability to camouflage into their surrounding, changing their skin colour.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ink_sac)Ink Sac$(/l) on death.

$(li)While they are not in camouflage state, they can be tamed with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/lobster_tail)Lobster Tails$(/l).$(br)$(li)Tamed Mimic Octopus can be commanded to stay, follow, and wander.$(br)$(li)Tamed Mimic Octopus can walk on land if tame too but only 5 minutes out of water.$(br)$(li)This can be circumvented by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/slimeball)Slimeballs$(/l), which will allow them to last longet out of water.

$(li)If you right click a tame Mimic Octopus with an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ink_sac)Ink Sac$(/l), It will stop changing colours to camouflage itself.$(br)$(li)You can also use $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/prismarine_shard)Prismarine Shard$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gunpowder)Gunpowder$(/l) on it, which will cause it to change it to change iti s look to rememble a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/guardian)Guardian$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/creeper)Creeper$(/l) respectively.

$(li)If you feed it with a few $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/mimicream)Mimicreams$(/l), it will actually learn how to mimic the attacks of the mobs allowing it to shoot lasers as a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/guardian)Guardian$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will learn how to mimic poison creatures as a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Also it will learn how to create small explosions as a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/creeper)Creeper$(/l), which will not damage itself.
